From:

Subject: RE: Interviews - 10/22 and 10/23 
Date: Thu, 17 Oct 2019 17:04:54 +0000 
Thanks very much, Sigrid. We'll keep holding that slot fa. 
Happy to do a video conference with Could you please propose some dates/times that would work for you and for 
her to do the conference? 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: Sigrid McCawley 
Sent: Thursday, October 17, 2019 10:08 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
> 
Subject: R[: Interviews - 10/22 and 10/23 
Just a  quick update has been working feverishly to try to secure her passport/visa so she can get here and I 
know that has been making efforts to help her but she doesn't have it yet. I know you are holding a slot 
for her interview for Tuesday but that will depend on whether she can actually travel here. 
Also —
work. 
has decided its best that she not travel but she is willing to do something via a video conference if that would 
Sigrid McCawley 
Partner

www.bsfllp.com

Subject: RE: Interviews - 10/22 and 10/23 
st> 
Thanks very much, Sigrid. If those times can't end up working, we can try to do some reshuffling of our own. Please let 
us know, and hopefully we can work out the scheduling. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: Sigrid McCawley < 
Sent: Tuesday, October 15, 2019 4:31 PM 
To: 
Cc: I.>; 
Subject: RE: Interviews - 10/22 and 10/23 
is driving in for the meeting and she said she needs to be back before the evening on 10/23 but I believe her 
commute is about an hour so we may be able to set her for a different date to come into the city and meet with you. 
Let me see what I can do about getting there earlier on 10/22 so you can meet with before 2:00 on 10/22. I may be 
able to have one of my partners go with her and then I could join when I arrive. Let me see what I can work out. 
Best, 
Sigrid 
Sigrid McCawley 
Partner 
BOIES 
SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
www.bsfIlp.com 
From: 
[mailto:
Sent: Tuesday, October 15, 2019 4:05 PM 
EFTA00024288

To: Sigrid McCawley 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Interviews - 10/22 and 10/23 
Hi Sigrid, 
Thanks very much for helping us coordinate these meetings. 
Meeting with from 2pm to 4pm will work for us, thank you. We'll plan to meet with her at our office (1 St. 
Andrews Plaza) on 10/22 at 2pm. 
Unfortunately, our schedules are a bit tight from 4pm to 6pm on 10/22 and for most of the day on 10/23. Would 
and/or be available on 10/22 before 2pm, on 10/22 after 6pm, or on 10/23 after 
5pm? 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
l  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: Sigrid 
McCawley < 
Sent: Tuesday, October 15, 2019 10:34 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
>; 
Subject: RE: Interviews - 10/22 and 10/23 
Hello — sorry for the delay but I have been trying to get a  handle on who is coming for the meeting etc. 
is a victim that I think will be helpful to your continuing investigation. She is working hard with your 
victims' coordinator to see if she can get here for the meeting. If she gets her passport/visa clearance and gets to the US 
then we could do an interview on the afternoon of Tuesday October 22rd starting at 2:00 if that works. I think she will 
probably take a bit longer because she was brought to the US by Epstein a number of times so maybe a lot 2 hours for the 
interview (from 2-4). 
is going to be attending the meeting and she said she could interview with you right after the 
meeting. I believe the notice says the meeting starts at 10:00 on October 23rd so maybe we plan to meet you at 12:00 
depending on the length of the victims' meeting. 
also wanted to come to the meeting. I know you met with her for a short while. If you would like to meet 
with her for a more detailed interview we could do that on the afternoon of October 22nd from 4 —  6 if that works. 
EFTA00024289

is She would like to try to attend via skype or some kind of conference line. 
I know you interviewed her sister If you would like to also interview I can set something up. 
Let me know if that works. 
Best, 
Sigrid 
Sigrid McCawley 
Partner 
BOIES SCHILLER FLEXNER LLP 
www.bsfIlp.com 
From: 
[mailto 
Sent: Thursday, October 10, 2019 3:39 PM 
To: 
Sigrid McCawley 
Cc: 
; 
Subject: Interviews - 10/22 and 10/23 
Hi Sigrid, 
Hope you're doing well. Mandy mentioned that some of your clients might be interested in being interviewed while they 
are in New York on 10/22 and 10/23. We'd be happy to get times on the calendar. Would you please let us know who 
would be available for interviews and what dates and times work for each client? 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
I  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007
